Professional Summary:
Results-driven IT professional with 5.1 years of experience in software development, specializing as a
Full-Stack Hybrid Mobile App Developer.
• Expertise in cross-platform development with Flutter, Angular, and React.js, ensuring seamless web
and mobile integration.
• Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, .NET, SQL, and modern frameworks for scalable and efficient
solutions.
• Skilled in Data Structures, Algorithms, and MVC frameworks for optimized performance and
maintainable codebases.
• Strong backend development experience with .NET with Entity Framework, Microservices and Azure
Bus Service for microservice communication.
• Hands-on in debugging, performance testing (Karma), and Agile SDLC methodologies.
Dedicated to delivering innovative, high-quality solutions that align technology with business objectives.

Domain Asset and Inventory management, telecom
